multiChannelClaim(uint256[],uint256[],ui.details: function to claim multiple channels at a time. Needs to send limited channels per call

params.actualAmounts: list of actual amounts should be aligned with channel ids index
params.plannedAmounts: list of planned amounts should be aligned with channel ids index
params.r: channel senders signatures in V R S for each channel
params.s: channel senders signatures in V R S for each channel
params.v: channel senders signatures in V R S for each channel

channelAddFunds(uint256,uint256).notice: the sender could add funds to the channel at any time any one can fund the channel irrespective of the sender
